dublin_core.dcvalue: Patients often fail to adhere to clinical recommendations when using current blood pressure self measurement BPSM methods and equipment As existing BPSM equipment is not able to detect non adherent behavior this could result in misdiagnosis and treatment error To overcome this problem we suggest introducing an alternative method for achieving reliable BPSM by measuring additional context meta data for validating patient adherence To facilitate this we have developed ValidAid a context aware system for determining patient adherence levels during BPSM
Reliable blood pressure self-measurement in the obstetric waiting room.
